Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 14th overall pick, by Texas in 1991...
Released by Texas on 3/2/1991...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 3/2/1991 to a minor league deal...
Had first career hit on 4/30/1993, off Mark Williamson (HOU)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/20/1993, off Chris Nabholz (PHI)...
Injured on 6/29/1994 with a Torn Thigh Muscle, out for full season...
Injured on 4/12/1995 with a Bruised Neck, out for 4 days...
Injured on 5/3/1995 with a Bruised Jaw, out for one week...
Injured on 7/13/1995 with a Bruised Heel, out for 3 days...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Minnesota on 1/31/1996 (Going to PIT: P T. Bolton. Going to MIN: 1B S. Hatteberg)...
Traded from Minnesota to Boston on 4/1/1997 (Going to MIN: 2B P. Reese. Going to BOS: C S. Hatteberg)...
Injured on 4/22/1998 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for one week...
